item.title: 量化交易遭遇10月以来最严重回撤，拥挤押注阵脚大乱
item.description: 量化对冲基金今年开局即陷亏损，因美国股市拥挤的投资策略遭遇挫折重创了这些基金策略，引发了市场对该领域回报率波动的担忧。【原文：Quant hedge funds are kicking off the year in the red, as setbacks in crowded US stocks clobbered the strategies, reviving concerns about volatile returns in the sector.】

item.title: 迈凯伦持股暗示阿布扎比最新基金L’imad将拥有广泛投资权限
item.description: 阿布扎比已将迈凯伦汽车公司所有者及其持有的中国电动汽车制造商蔚来股份并入国有企业L'imad控股公司，这表明该酋长国最新设立的投资平台将承担广泛职责。【原文：Abu Dhabi has folded the owner of McLaren Automotive and its stake in Chinese electric vehicle maker Nio Inc. into state-owned L’imad Holding Co., indicating a broad remit for the emirate’s newest investment vehicle.】

item.title: 经合组织称澳大利亚若不削减预算将面临债务"急剧"攀升
item.description: 经济合作与发展组织表示，除非工党政府准备改革僵化的税收体系以增加收入，或削减开支以适应其更受限制的财政状况，否则澳大利亚的国家债务将在未来几年"快速上升"。【原文：Australia’s national debt will “rise rapidly” over coming years unless the Labor government is prepared to overhaul a sclerotic tax system to boost revenue or cut spending to reflect its more constrained means, the Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development said.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官称人工智能将为电工和水管工创造就业机会
item.description: 随着人工智能威胁颠覆全球各国就业市场，英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋淡化了长期担忧，并指出当前对技术熟练的职业工人的需求正在不断增长。【原文：As artificial intelligence threatens to upends job markets in countries around the world, Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang brushed off longer term concerns and made the case that skilled vocational workers are seeing increasing demand now.】

item.title: 智利卡斯特政府撤回矿业部长任命，设立双重部委
item.description: 当选总统何塞·安东尼奥·卡斯特出人意料地将矿业纳入经济部管辖，放弃了任命必和必拓集团前高管担任独立矿业部长的计划，此举令智利矿业界大感意外。【原文：President-elect José Antonio Kast surprised Chile’s mining industry by folding mining into the economy ministry, abandoning plans to appoint a former BHP Group executive as a standalone mining minister.】

item.title: 法国护肤品牌欧舒丹据悉已选定银行为其美国IPO提供服务
item.description: 知情人士透露，2024年被亿万富翁所有者雷诺·盖格私有化的护肤品零售商欧舒丹集团，正考虑最早于今年在美国进行首次公开募股。【原文：L’Occitane Groupe, the skincare retailer that was taken private by its billionaire owner Reinold Geiger in 2024, is weighing an initial public offering in the US as soon as this year, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 埃尔莫蒂表示：没有绝对安全的资产，但仍需分散投资
item.description: 瑞银集团首席执行官塞尔吉奥·埃尔莫蒂表示，尽管"没有绝对安全的资产"，但对投资者而言，多元化配置如今显得尤为重要。【原文：Diversification is even more important now for investors, although there are “no safe assets,” according to UBS Group AG boss Sergio Ermotti.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德在卢特尼克抨击欧洲后离开达沃斯晚宴
item.description: 据知情人士透露，欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜·拉加德在达沃斯一场仅限受邀者参加的晚宴上，因美国商务部长霍华德·卢特尼克开始抨击欧洲而突然离席。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde abruptly walked out of an invitation-only sit-down dinner in Davos after US Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick started laying into Europe, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 挪威国防部长警示斯瓦尔巴海峡紧张局势升级
item.description: 挪威国防部长表示，由于北极地区大国竞争日益激烈，这个能源资源丰富的国家的极地群岛战略重要性正在上升。【原文：Norway’s defense minister said the strategic importance of the energy-rich nation’s polar archipelago is rising due to growing great-power rivalry in the Arctic.】

item.title: 红海航线重启受挫 中东地区风险持续发酵
item.description: 运载能源货物的船舶目前可能放弃经苏伊士运河航行的优势。【原文：Ships carrying energy cargoes are likely to forego the benefits of traveling through the Suez for now.】

item.description: 2026年，行业将面临重大变革与巨大风险。【原文：Industry faces big changes, big risks in 2026.】

item.description: 欧洲人承诺将坚决抵制美国总统的领土野心【原文：Europeans are promising to push back hard against the US president’s territorial ambitions】

item.title: 穆迪、KBRA称资产支持融资将推动私募信贷市场
item.description: 信用评级机构指出，资产支持融资将成为今年私营信贷增长的关键引擎，因为资本密集型行业对资金的需求已超出传统银行的风险承受能力。【原文：Asset-backed finance will be a key engine for private credit growth this year, as demand for funding in capital intensive sectors exceeds what traditional banks have the risk appetite to provide, according to credit ratings agencies.】

item.title: 美国购房申请量攀升至2023年以来最高水平
item.description: 上周美国购房抵押贷款申请量攀升至2023年1月以来最高水平，表明融资成本的进一步降低正推动房地产市场回暖。【原文：US mortgage applications for home purchases climbed last week to the highest since January 2023, suggesting a further easing in financing costs is contributing to a thaw in the housing market.】

item.title: 加拿大最严重的住房缺口之一引发7200万加元押注
item.description: 加拿大最大信用合作社之一温哥华市信用社（Vancity）与一家原住民私营信贷公司宣布达成1亿加元（约合7230万美元）的合作伙伴关系，共同为住房项目提供融资。【原文：Vancity, one of Canada’s largest credit unions, and an Indigenous-owned private credit firm launched a C$100 million ($72.3 million) partnership to finance housing projects.】

item.title: 关键矿产企业考虑在美国建设稀土工厂
item.description: 美国小型矿业公司大西洋战略矿产公司正考虑建设稀土加工厂，以加入美国推动关键材料本土化的行动。【原文：Atlantic Strategic Minerals, a small US mining company, is considering building a rare earths plant in a bid to join America’s push for domestic production of key materials.】

item.title: 伯克希尔·哈撒韦宣布在分拆计划后出售卡夫亨氏股份
item.description: 伯克希尔·哈撒韦公司可能很快出售其持有的卡夫亨氏公司部分或全部股份，而就在数月前，这家奶酪和番茄酱制造商才宣布计划拆分为两家独立公司。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway may soon sell some or all of its stake in Kraft Heinz Co., just months after the cheese and ketchup maker announced plans to split into two companies.】

item.title: 伦敦房价终结2009年以来最长下跌周期
item.description: 伦敦房价在工党预算案公布前七个月来首次上涨，终结了自全球金融危机以来最长的下跌周期。【原文：London house prices rose for the first time in seven months just before Labour’s budget, ending the longest run of losses since the global financial crisis.】

item.title: 太阳能超越金融科技，成为非洲新投资磁石
item.description: 研究发现，太阳能和可再生能源正与金融科技及支付领域争夺非洲风险投资的头号吸引力，投资者认为能源项目是非洲初创企业领域最具吸引力的投资方向。【原文：Solar and renewables are vying with fintech and payments as the top draws for African venture capital, with investors viewing energy projects as the most attractive on the continent’s startup scene, a study found.】

item.title: 印度某邦考虑效仿澳大利亚对儿童实施社交媒体禁令
item.description: 印度南部安得拉邦负责技术和人力资源事务的部长周二表示，该邦正在研究澳大利亚禁止16岁以下儿童使用社交媒体的政策。【原文：India’s southern state of Andhra Pradesh is studying Australia’s ban on children under 16 years of age from using social media, its minister in charge of technology and human resources said Tuesday.】

item.title: 南非肉价涨幅创八年新高 疫情蔓延致供应短缺
item.description: 南非牛肉价格12月涨幅创近八年新高，该国正面临牛口蹄疫疫情爆发，加剧了食品通胀压力。【原文：South African meat prices rose at the fastest pace in nearly eight years in December as the country battles an outbreak of foot-and-mouth disease in cattle, adding to food-inflation pressures.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利提升新兴市场吸引力，看好尼日利亚升级周期
item.description: 摩根士丹利对尼日利亚主权债券转为看涨，称该国更有能力应对低油价，并预测其信用评级将获得更多上调。【原文：Morgan Stanley turned positive on Nigerian sovereign bonds, saying the country is better placed to weather low oil prices and predicting more credit-rating upgrades.】

item.description: 农业企业MHP SE正启动乌克兰自2022年俄罗斯全面入侵该国以来的首次债券发售。【原文：Agricultural firm MHP SE is launching Ukraine’s first bond sale since Russia’s full-scale invasion of the country in 2022.】

item.title: 俄罗斯称乌克兰深夜袭击阿菲普斯克炼油厂
item.description: 俄罗斯称，乌克兰无人机于昨夜袭击了克拉斯诺达尔边疆区的阿菲普斯基炼油厂，这是该国能源基础设施遭受的最新袭击。【原文：Russia said Ukrainian drones targeted the Afipsky refinery in the Krasnodar region overnight, in the latest attack on the nation’s energy infrastructure.】

item.title: 前摩根大通银行家创立欧洲体育基金Athvance
item.description: 前摩根大通银行家卡里姆·本·雷杰布已设立一只投资基金，该基金将瞄准欧洲新兴及商业化程度较低的体育项目。【原文：Ex-JPMorgan Chase & Co. banker Karim Ben Rejeb has set up an investment fund that will target emerging and under-commercialized sports in Europe.】

item.title: PGIM计划斥资10亿美元进军私募信贷二级市场
item.description: 普信金融集团旗下资产管理公司PGIM正寻求在蓬勃发展的私募信贷股权交易市场中展开竞争。【原文：PGIM, the asset management arm of Prudential Financial, is seeking to compete in the booming market for trading private credit stakes.】

item.title: 泰晤士河管道爆裂致西伦敦居民断水
item.description: 泰晤士水务公司的一条供水主管道爆裂，导致伦敦西部多个富裕地区发生严重洪涝，道路封闭，居民供水中断。【原文：A burst water main owned by Thames Water caused major flooding, shut roads and cut supplies to homes across several affluent areas of west London.】

item.title: 亚马逊投资者押注AWS能助其摆脱低迷状态
item.description: 亚马逊公司的多头投资者正押注该公司股票已蓄势待发，有望在多年落后于科技巨头竞争对手后重夺市场领导地位。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. bulls are betting that the company’s stock is primed to reestablish its market leadership after years of trailing its Big Tech rivals.】
